body.name: Aquasonic Black Series Ultra Whitening Toothbrush – ADA Accepted Power Toothbrush - 8 Brush Heads & Travel Case – 40,000 VPM Electric Motor & Wireless Charging - 4 Modes w Smart Timer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 52 mins
features: 40,000 VPM Smart Toothbrush – Beauty, brains and power. The Black Series is a world class modern electric toothbrush packed with the most up to date technology. It features an ultra-powerful and industry leading motor producing 40,000 vibrations per minute, a lithium-ion battery, ultra-fast wireless charging, 4 mode operation, smart vibration timers, 8 DuPont engineered brush heads, and a custom travel case; all with a sleek ultra-slim, lightweight and IPX7 rated waterproof design.

Accepted by the American Dental Association (ADA) Council on Scientific Affairs – We put our money where your mouth is. Investing in premium oral care technologies has earned the Black Series the prestigious ADA seal of approval. It has shown efficacy in removing plaque and helping to prevent and reduce gingivitis. Black Series goes beyond just cleaning teeth – it provides complete oral care with unique modes that include one for whitening and polishing teeth, and one for improving gum health.

Modern Tech for a Healthy Smile - Black Series brings toothbrushes into modern times with its built-in enhanced features. A lithium-ion battery, ultra-fast wireless charging (forget outdated USB charging), 4 distinct brushing modes and a smart vibrating notification timer are some of the enhanced features built into the sleek and ergonomic waterproof black satin handle.

8 DuPont Brush Heads & Travel Case Included – Included are 8 brush heads engineered by world famous DuPont; a world leader in quality & materials science. Each brush head lasts 3-4 months so 8 will last for about 2.5 years. Also included is a convenient custom hard shell travel case made of BPA-free plastic with space for two brush heads. Black Series can last 4 full weeks (2 min/2x a day) on a full charge so it's perfect for on the go travel with the included travel case.
What's in the Box - 1 AquaSonic Black Series Smart Toothbrush, 1 wireless charging base, 8 DuPont brush heads, 1 travel case, warranty card, and user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best toothbrush ever!
reviews.reviewText: The Aquasonic Black Series Ultra Whitening Toothbrush has truly elevated my oral care routine. This ADA Accepted Power Toothbrush not only boasts a sleek design but also packs a powerful punch with its 40,000 VPM electric motor. The inclusion of 8 brush heads and a travel case ensures long-term usability and convenience on the go. The wireless charging feature is a game-changer, providing hassle-free charging without the need for cords. With 4 modes and a smart timer, this toothbrush caters to individual preferences and ensures thorough cleaning. The ultra-whitening capability adds an extra layer of confidence to my smile. Overall, the Aquasonic Black Series is a comprehensive dental care solution that combines advanced technology, versatility, and style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price. Comfort. Style. AMAZING!
reviews.reviewText: Look at those pearly whites!!! After using a Sonicare for many years the battery finally died and I was so reluctant to pay the price of the new ones. After hours of reviews and research I decided to take a chance on Aquasonic.Plain and simple, it works just as good as my Sonicare, it has all the same features, includes a compact sleek travel case and even extra brush heads!!! Price!!! You cannot beat the price!I’m so glad I decided to try this toothbrush out and I have already got so many others to try it too who love it.Thank you Aquasonic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite electric toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I love this toothbrush. I now have three different kinds; this one, a Phillips Sonicare, and a Braun with rotating head/s (depending on attachment). I like them all, but this toothbrush has become my go-to. It cleans really well, the different settings are a bonus feature (although I rarely use the whitening function as I like a more gentle brushing), and it doesn't have the tendency to "bounce" off your teeth when you switch positions nearly as much as others. Plus, it looks great, and the included replacement brush heads are a nice bonus.Great toothbrush at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is amazing! My mouth feels unbelievably clean and I'm pretty sure it is truly whitening my teeth. Great product. Love the timer on it especially and 4 different modes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a great product. Works as expected, good travel case and plenty of replacement brushes. Love the 4 different brushing speeds/intensities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush works well. I find I'm taking less time to cover each quadrant of my teeth. It brushes well between teeth and along the gum line. This is the 4th brand of electric toothbrush I have used. This one is so far the best. I still have yet to try an Oral B.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product and even better customer service!
reviews.reviewText: I got my fancy new toothbrush after owning a Philips sonic for many years. I had gone to a manual brush but started to notice some buildup and things weren't looking as good as they could. I came across this on Amazon.. the price was right, the reviews were good and it looked pretty cool. So I gave it a shot. I was not disappointed! (At this point anyway)Almost right away, I noticed that it was doing a much better job of cleaning than my manual brush. It was a little unsettling at first because as the brush vibrates, it can be a little unsettling at first and feel very strange. You do get used to this!Sadly, almost 1 month later the motor started to die on me. It should be noted that my teeth have changed several shades of white during that month. I contacted customer support on December 23rd 2023 with the expectation I wouldn't hear from them until at least boxing day or farther off. Within a couple of hours I got a response asking for details and invoice information. I was pleasantly surprised! I was shocked that Christmas Eve they contacted me again to verify some details. Everything was quick and smooth and not intrusive at all. I was even more surprised they contacted me on Christmas day to let me know that a refund had been issued and that I should purchase a new one and dispose of this one with the faulty motor. I felt so bad I actually apologize to the customer service rep for having to answer and field my issue on Christmas Day. LolIt should be noted that sometimes these motors and batteries.. you just get a lemon. As long as the company is willing to stand behind their product, I would not hesitate to order another one from these guys. Does the toothbrush work as good as my Philips which cost hundreds of dollars more? Absolutely! My teeth haven't looked this good in years. It is also kind of ironic that the main issue I had with my Philips is the motor finally died in it the same way.If you're one of those people that sees this toothbrush with no moving parts and thinks it's not as effective, Google how Sonic toothbrushes work.So in summary.. the product came quickly, packaging was excellent, presentation and quality seem to be right up there even despite the faulty motor. Customer service is outstanding. Despite my Philips brush being much more expensive, they worked equally as well. I may actually like this one better.Just a tip for first time users.. do not press hard. You don't need to. You want the tips of the bristles to basically dance on the surface of your teeth. If you press, the bristles will bend and not effectively clean. It's actually the tips of the bristles bouncing off your teeth that remove the plaque and do the cleaning. Move the brush very slowly and let the bristles do all the work for you. You should be able to go from one side to the other and back within the 30 seconds before it tells you to move on to the next part of your teeth. The brush should be slightly pointed down (or up) towards your gums. This is so the tips of the bristles get underneath your gum line and poke some of that junk out of there. However, changing the angle on a regular basis also helps hit spots that you might miss on a normal pass. After doing a normal (where the brush is completely horizontal) pass on my teeth, I will sometimes turn my toothbrush totally vertical so that the brush bristles hit my teeth a different way. It does make a difference.
Excelente aparato, deja nuestros dientes muy limpios.

Eine tolle Zahnbürste und Alternative zu anderen, wesentlich teurerern Markenherstellern. Sie entfernt Beläge gründlich und die Ersatz Bürstenköpfe sind auch erschwinglich. Das Reiseetui ist stabil und zweckmäßig.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unlike previous electric toothbrushes I've used from other famous makes, this brush vibrates at high frequency rather like the tools the dentists often use! Quiet in operation and gentle on the gums, I have found this device to be just what I was looking for! Battery life is excellent, only needing a recharge every few weeks. It doesn't have a warning light for 'over pressure' but the tone of the motor changes if it is put under undue pressure and that serves the same opurpose as a warning light!
この値段でこの本数の変えブラシがだと、少々壊れても許せるかと思ってました。が、壊れることもなく使いやすいです。
